alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 10 at 4:41AM EST until January 11 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Lake Effect Snow Warning, heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. The highest snowfall totals are expected south of Route 28. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight tonight to 3 PM EST Tuesday. For the Lake Effect Snow Warning, until 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may reach a half inch to one inch per hour at times. Experimental content below...do not use operationally. To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4337 7479 4341 7495 4343 7495 4347 7509 4332 7509 4326 7517 4325 7511 4318 7509 4317 7498 4323 7488 TIME Y22M01D10T1000Z-Y22M01D10T1800Z COORD...4356 7493 4364 7491 4382 7509 4380 7515 4362 7509 4329 7509 4326 7495 4329 7486 4338 7487 4344 7483 TIME Y22M01D10T1800Z-Y22M01D11T0600Z
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
